Samples

A collection of example applications that show how to use Kubernetes.
  • GUIDES
  • REFERENCE
  • SAMPLES
  • SUPPORT

Edit This Page

Samples

We have a wide variety of samples to choose from:

  • “Clustered Application Samples” and “Persistent Volume Samples” provide some examples that show how to implement some popular software packages such as OpenShift, Ceph, Cassandra, and WordPress. These guides try to serve as canonical walkthroughs that help you use familiar packages with Kubernetes.

  • “Mulit-tier Application Samples” are generally of a more contrived and instructional nature, highlighting key concepts that you’ll encounter when developing with Kubernetes, and teaching some principles of building Kubernetes applications.

Recently updated samples

The Kubernetes team is highlighting these samples as being the most up-to-date. Active upkeep is being done or has recently been done on these samples to ensure they are high quality and work on Kubernetes v1.1.

 


MEAN Stack
Guestbook + Redis
